title: Integration of Learning Processes and Emotional Experiences: Simulation-Based Education Design in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies knowledge and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Social sector job-linked education for office/administrative working learners, combining VR simulation with direct instruction in student-centered activities within a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply interest-inducing strategies with over 80% effectiveness while analyzing social conflict scenarios in a VR simulation environment
Learners can identify at least three anxiety-inducing factors in the learning process and propose coping strategies using self-efficacy assessment tools
Learners achieve a proficiency score of 90+ out of 100 in social problem-solving simulations through peer feedback and instructor-led guidance
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
